name: Datalla
tag_list: server, desktop, mobile, software, networking, storage, cloud, security, virtualisation, unified-communications, supply---procurement, solution-implementation, solution---system-design, systems-integration, application-development, training---development
overview: Datalla is an independent and vendor agnostic provider of technology services and solutions that works with clients to deliver technology improvement and advantage. We provide a range range of solutions to address complex challenges that delivers strategic and operational advantages for your business and technology environment including Server, Desktop, Mobile, Software, Networking, Storage, Cloud, Security, Virtualisation and Unified Communications solutions. Whilst our range of professional, value-added technology services designed to support your current or future investment in technology including Supply & Procurement, Solution Implementation, Solution & System Design, Systems Integration, Application Development and Training & Development.
